speaker: Blacksmith
lines: 'I have heard whispers, of a sword covered in stone.'
'It's a strange one, buried in rock.'
'Not guarded by anything, yet no one has managed to pull it out.'
'Here ill mark it on your map.'
'If you somehow do manage it, bring it back, I would like to study how it was made.'

choices.text: Go to the sword covered in stone
